name: Pirate Temple
description:
You play as a pirate in a temple, the goal is to collect all the coins but there is a catch.

The coins are heavy.. if you have too many of them at the same time good luck jumping high.

Controlls

A D, LEFT RIGHT : Movement

SPACE : Jump

F : Drop Coin

note: This is my first game, prior to entering the game jam I didn't know anything about scripting in c sharp, unity and animation. 

Hope you will enjoy it.
